name: FOS (itch) (cKolmos)
description:
FOS is a game about exploration, challenge and the power of light. 

You will play a long-tailed lightball, born in a world of darkness. Your goal: to bring light. 

Using trial and error, you will discover the nature of your surroundings as you learn.

DEVELOPMENT

Currently working hard on improving the looks, sounds and mechanics of FOS aiming for a 2018 release. 

We’re preparing dozens of new levels and worlds that will hopefully blow your mind. 

Thank you all for your support! 

We’ll be uploading new material pretty soon! 

SUPPORT US

If you like the game, you can share with your friends and follow us on Twitter!

You can also support us here.
